request.name: :id
request.comment: REQUIRED String. The ID of the MediaAttachment in the database.

request.name: Authorization
request.comment: REQUIRED Provide this header with Bearer <user token> to gain authorized access to this API method.

request.name: thumbnail
request.comment: Object. The custom thumbnail of the media to be attached, encoded using multipart form data.

request.name: description
request.comment: String. A plain-text description of the media, for accessibility purposes.

request.name: focus
request.comment: String. Two floating points (x,y), comma-delimited, ranging from -1.0 to 1.0. See Focal points for cropping media thumbnails for more information.
